price: Imana Allah, ni Yo Nyenubwami Igaba Ikaganza amajuru indwi n’isi n’ibiri muri vyo. Umusi umuhero w’isi wageze rero, ibiremwa vyose bigahwera, hanyuma bikazuka kugira bihemberwe ivyo vyakoze, kuri uwo musi abahakana Aayah n’ivyemezo vy’Imana Allah, bazogira agahombo gakomeye;
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'ṭilūna
